sentences.en: A nasal spray or drops would ease your symptoms, but don't overuse them or further congestion could result.
sentences.cn: 鼻腔喷剂或滴剂能减轻症状，但请勿使用过频，否则鼻塞可能会加重。

sentences.en: Attempts to restrict parking in the city centre have further aggravated the problem of traffic congestion.
sentences.cn: 在城市中心限制停车的尝试使阻塞的问题更加严重.

sentences.en: Congestion could be countered by persuading more drivers to get on their bikes.
sentences.cn: 通过劝说更多的驾车者改骑自行车可以缓解交通拥堵。

sentences.en: Congestion of the mucosa is a variable sign.
sentences.cn: 粘膜充血是不恒定的表现.

sentences.en: Energy consumption, congestion and pollution have increased.
sentences.cn: 能源消耗、交通堵塞以及污染状况愈加严重。

sentences.en: I have never allowed the excuse to be pleaded of congestion at our ports.
sentences.cn: 我从来不容许以任何借口为我们港口的拥塞情形作辩护.

sentences.en: Nose drops often relieve nasal congestion.
sentences.cn: 滴鼻剂常可缓解鼻腔充血.

sentences.en: Parking near the school causes severe traffic congestion.
sentences.cn: 在学校附近泊车会引起严重的交通堵塞.

sentences.en: RED can greatly alleviate the congestion status of networks.
sentences.cn: RED可以在很大程度上改善网络中的拥塞状况.

sentences.en: The problems of traffic congestion will not disappear in a hurry.
sentences.cn: 交通堵塞问题不会很快消失。

sentences.en: The rest of the European powers were in a state of intensifying congestion.
sentences.cn: 其余的欧洲强国则处于越来越拥挤的状态.

sentences.en: The route was designed to relieve traffic congestion.
sentences.cn: 这条路是为缓解交通拥挤而开辟的.

sentences.en: This paper studies congestion control problems in real time multicast video distribution.
sentences.cn: 研究实时多目视频发布中的拥塞控制问题.

sentences.en: Transmission congestion is a popular phenomenon of power system operation.
sentences.cn: 输电阻塞是电力系统运行中的常见问题.

sentences.en: Zefter reeled as if she were intoxicated, overwhelmed by the clamor and congestion.
sentences.cn: 泽弗特尔摇摇晃晃地走着,好象喝醉了酒似的.她已经被嘈杂的声音和拥挤的人群闹得晕头转向了.

phrases.tran_cn: 拥挤收费；堵车费；高峰期行车收费

trans.tran_cn: 拥挤，堵车，阻塞，充血，（人口）过剩，稠密
trans.tran_en: If there is congestion in a place, the place is extremely crowded and blocked with traffic or people
